New Records: Taskin Ahmed became the leading wicket taker in the Super 12 segment of the tournament with 8 wickets
Key Match Events: Najmul Hossain Shanto posted his highest international score in T20Is
Zimbabwe's Richard Ngarava hit a four and huge six from the third and fourth deliveries to leave just five required
Shakib Al Hasan ran out Sean Williams with a turn and throw in one motion from his own bowling to seal the deal
Blessing Muzarabani was stumped from the final ball of the match, but the keeper had taken the ball ahead of the stumps
Post-Match Reflections: The win took Bangladesh to four points in Group Two but they are still to play India and Pakistan
The loss was a dent to Zimbabwe's finals chances and they remain on three points
Miscellaneous Highlights: A blistering spell by Bangladesh paceman Taskin Ahmed (3-19) inspired the win
Nurul Hasan was adjudged to have taken the ball ahead of the stumps
Others: Bangladesh sealed victory over Zimbabwe by three runs in the T20 World Cup after a dramatic final delivery at the Gabba had to be rebowled
